title: Kubernetes Basics
description: Learn the basics related to the Kubernetes world with hands-on xperience.

courses.title: [Day 1] - Core Concepts
courses.description: Learn about the Cluster Architecture, Master and Worker nodes.

courses.title: [Day 2] - Kubernetes Basics
courses.description: Kubectl, Pods, Replicasets, Deployments, Namespaces, Services.

courses.title: [Day 3] - Kubernetes Advanced
courses.description: Imperative vs Declarative, Labels, Selectors, Taints, Tolerations, Node Selector, Node Affinity, Daemonset, Requests and Limits, Rolling updates, Rollbacks, Multi container pods, InitContainers.
